ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence my decisions and treatment of others, leading me to prioritize personal gain over humble service and genuine relationships?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

such as leaders , colleagues , or volunteers
ambition.question: Did your desire for power and dominance in your community or social circles influence how you treated others, such as leaders, colleagues, or volunteers?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Did I make accumulation of wealth and possessions a driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make accumulation of wealth and material possessions a driving force in my life, potentially leading me away from trusting in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Did you mistreat, harass, or discriminate against others through your words, actions, or attitudes?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: in any unjust treatment , harassment , or discrimination against others
oppression.question: Did I engage in any unjust treatment, harassment, or discrimination against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or inappropriate language when expressing my opinions in social gatherings, online forums, or conversations?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in my conversations with others, using language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others with vulgarity or inappropriate language, thus violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable

gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what is reasonable, especially in moments of celebration or social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: for comfort and pleasure in eating and drinking
gluttony.question: Did I allow my desire for comfort and pleasure in eating and drinking to become excessive?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I put excessive and wasteful personal expenses ahead of my financial obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over my family 's needs or important responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me, prioritizing unnecessary expenditures over my family's needs or important responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs through casual conversations, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing another person 's personal struggles or shortcomings

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
